mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (student_num, password, name, grade, major, class_name, email, phone, party_branch_name, role, join_party_time, identity, join_party_contact) VALUES (#{studentNum}, #{password}, #{name}, #{grade}, #{major}, #{className}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{partyBranchName}, #{role}, #{joinPartyTime}, #{identity}, #{joinPartyContact})
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM user WHERE student_num = #{studentNum} and is_delete = 0
SELECT count(1) FROM user where student_num=#{studentNum} and password=#{password} and is_delete = 0
SELECT (email) FROM user WHERE student_num=#{studentNum} and is_delete = 0
SELECT * FROM user WHERE student_num=#{studentNum} and is_delete = 0
